attributes.action: require Flapjack manufacturers to label the ingredients if non traditional products are added - e.g. desiccated coconut.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I petition that Flapjack manufacturers be required to label the ingredients if non traditional products are added e.g. desiccated coconut.

Further manufacturer's should not be able to label their flapjack's as Traditional if they contain desiccated coconut.
